title: The Children of Green Knowe and The River at Green Knowe
description: Two classic stories, The Children of Green Knowe and The River at Green Knowe collected in one volume.'What if my great-grandmother is a witch?' thought Tolly.Tolly's great-grandmother wasn't a witch, but both she and her old house Green Knowe were full of a very special kind of magic. And Green Knowe turned out not to be the lonely place Tolly had imagined. There were other children living in the house... children who had been happy there centuries before.
author: Lucy M. Boston
